SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetRevenue
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetRevenueChanges, BudgetRevenueLogic
public class PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue extends PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue implements BudgetRevenueLogic, BudgetRevenueChanges
Represents a revenue entry specifically for the Co-funded (Συγχρηματοδοτούμενο) part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).

This class handles co-financed resources, ensuring that any financial changes are correctly propagated through the co-funded hierarchy and synchronized with the base public investment data.

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue(String code, String description, String category, String type, long amount)
      Constructs a new Co-funded PDE revenue entry and creates its corresponding filtered representation in the PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue scope.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description of the revenue
      category - the financial category (e.g., "ΕΣΟΔΑ")
      type - the investment type (e.g., "ΣΥΓΧΡΗΜΑΤΟΔΟΤΟΥΜΕΝΟ")
      amount - the initial amount in euros

    • implementChangesOfEqualDistribution

      public void implementChangesOfEqualDistribution(long change)
      Description copied from interface: BudgetRevenueChanges
      Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Equal Distribution strategy. This typically involves saving history, updating the current account, and propagating the fixed change value to all related categories.
      Specified by:
      implementChangesOfEqualDistribution in interface BudgetRevenueChanges
      Parameters:
      change - the fixed amount to be added or subtracted.

    • implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment

      public void implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment(double percentage)
      Description copied from interface: BudgetRevenueChanges
      Orchestrates the implementation of an amount change using the Percentage Adjustment strategy. This typically involves saving history, updating the current account, and propagating the percentage-based change to all related categories.
      Specified by:
      implementChangesOfPercentageAdjustment in interface BudgetRevenueChanges
      Parameters:
      percentage - the percentage adjustment (e.g., 0.05 for +5%).

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(long amount)
      Sets the amount for this co-funded revenue entry.

      Performs financial rounding and validates the value. If negative, the system reverts to the previous state using the history deque.

      Overrides:
      setAmount in class BudgetEntry
      Parameters:
      amount - the new amount to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided amount is negative
